prelude.value: As the South Florida Community grows and evolves we wanted to start recording what that growth looks like and better understanding the designers that make up our community. The pandemic this last year has made it clear that our community isnâ€™t going anywhere, but has also called for a look into the gaps that might exist with our current resources.
As designers we know taking a deeper look into who we are serving and designing comes first before anything else and that goes double when looking into our own community.
